Auto-Submit_Invoices_for_Approval.description: If true, the Invoice automatically submits for approval.

Automatically_Generate_Installments.description: If true, the Billing Schedule automatically generates the installments.

Automatically_Regenerate_Installments.description: If true, the Billing Schedule automatically regenerates installments.

Automatically_Submit_Schedule_for_Approv.description: If  true, the schedule automatically submits for approval.

Automatically_Submit_Schedules.description: If true, the Billing Schedule automatically submits.

Recurrence.description: The recurrence that determines the installment dates based on the billing frequency.

Recurring_Invoice_Day.description: The day in the recurring invoice date.

Review_Not_Required_to_Bill.description: If true, the Billing Schedule transactions are automatically billable. Review is not required for billing.
